description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Devilsong is a third-person space dogfighter set in a dark future where mankind finds itself under constant threat both from within and without. “Deviljacks,” the spacefighters of this era, speak of the siren song of space: the lure of freedom, fortune, and glory that calls the unwitting to venture out into its depths – only to find it cold, hollow and full of danger. They call this the Devilsong.

They call this the Devilsong.
